title: Raven's.Cry.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Raven's.Cry.Repack-R.G.Mechanics





Release info:  

Year of release : 2015
Genre : RPG
Developer : Reality Pump
Publisher : TopWare Interactive
Publication Type : RePack
Game Language: ENG
Sound language: ENG
Crack: ALI213





System requirements:  
Operating system : Windows Vista / 7/8 / 8.1
Processor : Intel / AMD Quad Core CPU with 2.0 GHz
RAM : 4 GB
Graphics card : Geforce GTX 460 or ATI Radeon HD 5000 Series with 512 MB
Sound Card : Sound device
Free space on hard disk : 8.65 GB


Game Information:  


Raven's Cry - action-adventure about a truly ruthless and bloodthirsty pirates,
where you will be involved in brutal melee battles and engagements with various
historical weapons, explore different locations, as well as to take moral decisions
that will affect the story.

The end of the 17th century. Young Scottish boy Christopher and his family, trying to
escape from hunger, get on a ship bound for the New World. Near Jamaica, he is attacked
by ruthless pirates, and Christopher is the only survivor. The plot begins with the
moment when matured Christopher goes in search of those who so cruelly killed his family.


Game Features:  

Beautiful cinematic cut scenes carrying these dark adventures in the life of Christopher.

Open World Caribbean offers reliable storyline, as well as dozens of side quests and secrets
that are waiting to see what would be discovered.

Countless activities, from smuggling and a treasure hunt to bounty hunting.
Your decisions affect the development of the plot and characters, creating
a unique game experience.

Psychological elements based on the player's actions affect the fighting styles
and habits of your enemies.

Sophisticated and unique branch of character development,
affects both land travel, and the sea.

Extensive economic system; knowing where they sell coffee, chocolate, marijuana,
and other materials will give you great profits.


RePack Features:  

Raven's Cry
Do not recoded
Leaving the best quality videos (1080p)
